Literature.Title: Structural and functional characterization of NDBP-4 family antimicrobial peptides from the scorpion Mesomexovis variegatus.
Literature.Author: Jiménez-Vargas JM, Ramírez-Carreto S, Corzo G, Possani LD, Becerril B, Ortiz E
